award_title: CPS-Small: Provable Enforcement of Hard Constraints in Reinforcement Learning-Based Controllers for Safety-Critical CPS
subject: Making RL safety work easier to reuse
body:
Hi Negar,

I came across your NSF project on provable safety constraints for RL-based controllers. Given the focus on formal guarantees that transfer across training and deployment, I thought Ouro might be relevant.

Ouro provides a thin API layer over computational workflows, letting other researchers reuse methods directly instead of recreating them from papers.

NSF increasingly expects broader impacts around accessibility and reuse, but it's hard to demonstrate that work is actually being used beyond citations. Ouro gives you a concrete way to show real-world engagement with your methods.

Happy to give you a quick peek if it's useful.

Hope you get some rest over winter breakâ€”happy holidays!

Best,

Matt Moderwell
